andromeda.why: Sets sovereign terms for belonging; declines coercive bonds.

arcturus.why: Defines basic principles and pacing—clear container before change.

draco.why: Threshold guardian—loyalty to values checked at the door.

lyra.why: Plain ritual/phrasing makes acceptance or refusal legible.

orion-dark.why: Early safety-seeking can harden into intolerance-as-control.

orion-light.why: Courage to hold a principled ‘no’ without aggression.

pleiades.why: Need-awareness and care inform the principle, not hostility.

sirius.why: Private value hygiene; no explicit transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Rejects exploitation; revolution only when needs require.

arcturus.why: Places criteria and thresholds—due process before rejection.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to the pact; fair gatekeeping.

lyra.why: Clear, unadorned wording keeps terms receivable.

orion-dark.why: ‘Our values or else’ can drift into coercive orthodoxy.

orion-light.why: Integrity to act when the line is crossed.

sirius.why: Skilled application of values, not formal teaching yet.

andromeda.why: Crowd-pleasing revolt outsources agency to group mood.

arcturus.why: Reactive purges and misplacement—process breaks down.

draco.why: Status witch-hunts and scapegoating in the name of purity.

orion-dark.why: Dogmatic purity tests force compliance over truth.

orion-light.why: Lesson: stabilize criteria, target, and timing.

pleiades.why: Appeasement to keep harmony erodes the value set.

andromeda.why: Liberates by setting fair, consent-based charter.

arcturus.why: Designs principle protocol—criteria, grievance path, review cadence.

draco.why: Guards thresholds; prevents predatory capture of the pact.

lyra.why: Frames a clear cultural statement of values.

orion-dark.why: Policy can ossify into intolerance doctrine.

pleiades.why: Attuned rollout keeps the community regulated.

andromeda.why: Uses authority to free the group from coercive structures.

arcturus.why: Sets standards—consent, due process, and fair redistribution of influence.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to the charter; no favoritism.

lyra.why: Cultural rites articulate the revolution without spectacle.

orion-dark.why: Projection risk: orthodoxy policing in the name of values.

orion-light.why: Holds integrity when reform faces factional pressure.

sirius.why: Instruction in principle law—liberation through clear standards.

andromeda.why: Embodied sovereignty: accepts or dissolves bonds by truth.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring canon for principled membership and reform.

draco.why: Presence can read as gate to ‘true believers.’

lyra.why: Archetypal, spare language sets the culture of values.

orion-dark.why: Principle canon can drift into law-over-life coercion.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to trigger reform—or abstain—by integrity.

sirius.why: Royal instruction: the canon of principles transmitted by presence/protocol.
